name: Starlight Ranch
description:
Explore a new undiscovered planet full of wonders and mysteries and use everything to your advantage to create the perfect life on it.

Instructions:

  • Press E to Open the Inventory
  • Mover with Arrow Keys and WASD
  • Use the Left Click Button  to use your Inventory Items
  • Interact with the Store and Chest with your Right Click Button
  • Drag and Drop Items to get rid of them from your Inventory

Current plans for future Updates:

  • Upgrades for your Tools
  • Fish Tank
  • More Fauna
  • More Recipes for Cooking, Strange Seeds, and Misc Items.
  • More Items, like Lanterns, Furnaces, Kitchens and More.
